content: {{knowledge objective |Identifiant=OIC-242-02-B |Item_parent=Hyperthyroidism |Item_parent_short=Hyperthyroidism |Rank=B |Title=Knowing the prevalence of hyperthyroidism |Description=None |Rubric=Epidemiology |Contributors=Dr Camille Buffet,Dr Magalie Haissaguerre |Order=2}} Prevalence is high but varies from country to country (0.2 to 1.9% for all causes combined).
